# imdb_bfi |> 
#   bind_rows() |> 
#   left_join(dim_title, by = c("name_film" = "primaryTitle", "year" = "startYear")) |> 
#   left_join(ratings, by = "tconst") |> 
#   filter(is.na(averageRating))
# 
# clean_bfi |> 
#   mutate(decade = year - (year %% 10)) |>
